name: water-quality-monitoring-system
description: Water Quality Monitoring System - Full Stack Deployment

scripts.deploy:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:functions: cd functions && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:firebase: npm run deploy:client && npm run deploy:functions && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:mqtt-bridge: cd mqtt-bridge && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/my-app-da530/mqtt-bridge:latest && gcloud run deploy mqtt-bridge --image gcr.io/my-app-da530/mqtt-bridge:latest --region us-central1
